overview: Keeping A Piece Of You: Lonely mom Diana (Sovereign Syre) wants her stepson Joshua (Nathan Bronson) to impregnate her because she wants to keep a piece of Joshua and by the same way, her late husband. Just Between You, Me And God: Father Romero (John Strong) a hypocritical priest convinces scared teen Lucy (Gia Derza) to give up anal virginity. He tells her that he can look her over to see if she's really okay. Not only that but only HE can make sure that she's pure and save her from her sins.
title: Keeping A Piece Of You
